duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist marketing team in creation of artwork codes, tracking of projects, and reviewing artwork.
Fully manage artwork agency relationship and processes.
Manage and lead internal cross-functional communication and relationships in relation to artwork.
Preparations for new and reformulation needs for the brand.
Competitive analysis and competitive product ordering to support the marketing team.
Issue creative requests and support follow-up for projects at hand to ensure timely and accurate delivery.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a related field preferred
